PAGE.p: Released versions of OpenConnect are available from the FTP site:
Release tarballs (since 3.13) are signed with the PGP key with fingerprint BE07 D9FD 5480 9AB2 C4B0 FF5F 6376 2CDA 67E2 F359.
The latest release is OpenConnect v8.10 (PGP signature), released on 2020-05-14 with the following changelog:

ul.li: Update Android build dependencies and bump API level to support Android 10.
Fix potential buffer overflow with GnuTLS describing local certs (CVE-2020-12823).

PAGE.p: For older releases and change logs, see the changelog page.
The latest source code is available from the git repository at:
